game_description: THIS IS A DEMO VERSION OF SEP'S DINER. FULL GAME INCLUDES 54 LEVELS, MORE RECIPES AND CO-OP MULTIPLAYER! Welcome to Sep's Diner, the new restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It's up to you! Level after level, your experience will increase as well as the number of your gourmet customers. They are in a hurry, so make it quick to satisfy them before they leave! Impatient, they won't let you make a mistake... Be precise to make the best possible profit! Including a brand new Dessert restaurant: Sep's Donut! Game Features : 路 2 restaurants 路 3 game modes included: Timed, Relaxed, Multiplayer 路 27 levels included per restaurant 路 Co-op multiplayer up to 4 players 路 Intense and thrilling levels! 路 Immersive audio ambiance 路 Impatient customers with fun voices 路 Beautiful scenery and colored lights 路 More than 30 different combinations for burgers recipes! 路 Pancakes, donuts, waffles, cupcakes, ice-creams and milkshakes in the Dessert caf茅!
review_1: This game is awesome its feels like reality
review_2: webnetka*com   metaquest*forumactif*com I tried the demo but I still prefer "clash of chef"(which has a good UX and no glitch) and I hesitate to buy Sep'sDiner because of different problem/glitches I encounter . Here they are : - I had lot of trouble with icecream. Difficult to pick it, sometimes it restart, lot of time lost and Im still not sure of how to do to avoid this difficulties - people are complaining it takes too much time though I'm waiting for the machine to do the job and didn't loose any time ?? - everything is far, I have to teleport for every single thing - color of caramel and chocolate are not always so clear (besides the picture of what they want and what they finally get are not same) - when I cut things, there are always parts falling on the floor... Because of all this things, I hesitate to buy it Not sure the definitive version has resolve all this ? ================================== Pour 茅changer vos exp茅riences et vos avis:  metaquest*forumactif*com  Pour les promos quest :  webnetka*com
